title: I already usually don't agree with Power Rankings, but having Najin at 9th place is absurd
body: Stop being so korean oriented omg. Yes LCK is normally better than Western teams but they are so overated -.-

replies.body: While I don't agree with the Power Rankings provided by Riot (as it is usually a clusterfk of people that don't understand each region). I can't say that SK/Fnatic/TSM/c9 can beat Najin let alone every team they rated 1-10. /sad-but-true
Cloud9 is never ranked #1 so I just ignore the Power Rankings. They obviously don't know anything.
